pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fortio is a microservices (http, grpc) load testing library, command line tool, advanced echo server, and web UI in Go (golang). Fortio allows to specify a set query-per-second load and record latency histograms and other useful stats.

use.flag: Allow fortio to run as a system-wide service; installs an init script and creates a fortio user:group
